name: Seafox
description:
Seafox is a modern remake of the classic Commodore 64 cartridge game published by Brøderbund game back in 1983.

Shoot and maneuver your way through 5 exciting missions with enemy subs, depth charges, magnetic mines, and other hazards while you try to sink the enemy merchant ships to stop supplies getting through.

All the while your have to contend with a constantly depleting fuel supply, and running out of torpedos.

Don't shoot the re-supply dolphin who brings spare torpedoes + fuel!!
